short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant access to all your bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access your bookmarks through omnibox search capabilities.
Options page allows inline editing of your created bookmarks, changing them from private to public and vica-versa. 
Easily manage access to all your document link through an easy to search interface directly in the search bar. 
Direct toolbar access to bookmark creation, with options for keeping bookmarks private.
